content:
Rainer L said
Hello, I have reinstalled Windows 11 and now I have the problem that my mail password is supposedly incorrect. I have tried everything, entered the correct passwords from T-Online, changed the passwords, nothing helps. I have also reinstalled Thunderbird, but all to no avail. Could you please help me so that I can use this wonderful program again? Here is my system: i7 6700 K, WIN 11 HOME, GTX 970 graphics card, 500 GB SSD, 16 GB RAM, 1 TB hard disk,

This page seems to suggest you need a separate password for email apps, different from the one used to access the account in webmail:

https://www.telekom.de/hilfe/apps-dienste/e-mail/programme/passwort-verwalten

https://www.telekom.de/hilfe/apps-dienste/e-mail/einstellungen/posteingang-postausgang-server
creator: sfhowes

content:
Holq Prueba reparar la carpeta en cuestión:

1-En el menú de Thunderbird, seleccione Archivo -> Sin conexión -> Trabajar sin conexión. 2-Haga clic derecho en la carpeta que desea reparar y seleccione Propiedades. 3- En la pestaña Información general, haga clic en el botón Reparar carpeta. 4-Clic en OK.

Saludos
creator: pcp04

content:
This is a thread on the community support forum so it is best not to post personal information like email addresses and such in public.

You are not required to make any donations in order to use the Thunderbird email client. The donations are optional as it helps the Thunderbird developers and community. There is no way for your Thunderbird email client installed on your macOS to know you have donated.

From the FAQ further down on https://www.thunderbird.net/donate/

You can use https://www.thunderbird.net/donate/help/ to ask for refunds if you prefer.
creator: James

content:
Ciao, le informazioni su questo problema sono raccolte qui -> https://forum.mozillaitalia.org/index.php?topic=79061.0

Se possibile riporta in quella discussione o anche qui sotto il maggior numero di informazioni sulla tua situazione. In particolare:

  • Problema su tutti i messaggi o solo di alcuni?
  • A quando risale l'ultimo backup di cui disponi?
  • L'account è IMAP o POP3?
  • Gli stessi messaggi sono visibili tramite webmail?
creator: @next
